FuncDef: This feature is only applicable when DHCPv6-snooping is enabled. The Ethernet header MAC address on DHCPv6 is used as the default key host identification. This command allows addition the keys for identifying the DHCPv6 host. The interface-id can be included in addition to the MAC key to further differentiate each DHCPv6 host.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the DHCP6 user-identification for this interface. Values-mac - Specifies to use only the Ethernet MAC of the DHCPv6 message to identify the host..
